    • Method Detail

      • parseEvent

        @NotNull
public static <T> T parseEvent​(String source,
                               Class<T> type)
                        throws CloudManagerApiException,
                               IllegalArgumentException
        Attempts to convert the provided string source into the specified event type T.

        T must be one of: - PipelineExecutionStartEvent - PipelineExecutionStepStartEvent - PipelineExecutionStepWaitingEvent - PipelineExecutionStepEndEvent - PipelineExecutionEndEvent

        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of event
        Parameters:
        source - String representation of the event
        type - class type of event
        Returns:
        a fully populated event of the specified type
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - if an error occurs during parsing
        IllegalArgumentException - if passed and unknown event type.

      • isValidSignature

        public static boolean isValidSignature​(@NotNull
                                       @NotNull String eventBody,
                                       @NotNull
                                       @NotNull String signature,
                                       @NotNull
                                       @NotNull String clientSecret)
                                throws CloudManagerApiException
        Validates an event against a signature.
        Parameters:
        eventBody - the original String representation of the event, in UTF-8 encoding
        signature - the digest from the header
        clientSecret - the client secret signature for calculations
        Returns:
        true if the body signature is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        CloudManagerApiException - when an error occurs during processing
        See Also:
        Webhook Signature Validation
